id us-core-patient-id

code : _id

base :Patient

type : token

expression : Patient.id

xpath : f:Patient/f:id

xpathUsage : normal

mulitpleOr : True (Conformance Expectation = MAY)

mulitpleAnd : True ( Conformance Expectation = MAY)
